---
name: Design Issue
about: Report a design issue
title: '[Design Issue]: '
labels: ''
---

## Welcome! ##

Report any design issues with our web components or Figma UI Kit.

Please remember to search for open issues before submitting.

### Affected Version ###

List the packages and versions the issue is found in.

### Description ###

Provide details about what design issue you are reporting and for which component.
Detail if this is an issue specific to the design of a component or the designer experience
of a Figma component.
